caption.title: Robustness of results to different values of the basic reproductive number.
caption.p: R 0 is varied by changing the infection rate, Î², between subfigures. For R 0 = 1.2, true probabilities greater than 0.97 are classified into bins of size 0.01. For R 0 = 1.6, true probabilities greater than 0.98 are classified into bins of size 0.01. For R 0 = 2 and R 0 = 4, true probabilities greater than 0.99 are classified into a bin of size 0.01.
